storiesGrid.index.moreStories:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the 'More Stories' section.
**UI Location**: Community → Stories Grid (section header)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the community stories grid.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "More Stories from our community"
storiesGrid.index.listenLearn:
**Functional Purpose**: Sub-heading/description for the 'More Stories' section.
**UI Location**: Community → Stories Grid (section sub-header)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the community stories grid.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Listen, learn and be inspired by our community members."
